Job poster
Message
About the job
Full-Stack Engineer 
Join a high-performing engineering team in building impactful digital products at scale. On behalf of a government agency, we are hiring a full-stack engineer with strong fundamentals, a passion for clean code, and the ability to deliver high-quality applications end-to-end.
This is an opportunity to work on modern, production-grade systems using React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and cloud-native technologies—while contributing to meaningful, user-focused digital services.

Key responsibilities will include the following: 
Build and ship full-stack features using modern frameworks and best practices.
Design, develop, and maintain scalable, secure, and high-quality software applications.
Apply engineering excellence through code reviews, automated testing, pair programming, and XP-inspired practices.
Work with product owners to refine user stories and clarify technical requirements.
Collaborate with QA to support test automation and defect resolution.
Partner with DevOps teams to improve build, deployment, and release pipelines.
Contribute to architecture discussions and produce key technical documentation.
Uphold the principles of software craftsmanship, delivering clean, maintainable, and elegant code.

Qualifications:
A minimum of 3 solid years’ experience in full-stack web development or software engineering.
Strong understanding of computer science fundamentals — data structures, algorithms, design patterns, and software architecture principles.
Proficient in React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL with real-world implementation experience.
Experience with CI/CD pipelines, automated testing, and DevOps practices as well as Kotlin
Familiarity with cloud environments (AWS experience is a plus).
Demonstrated ability to write clean, maintainable, production-ready code within agile teams.
Prior exposure to government or large-scale enterprise applications.

What’s in it for you? 
Work on meaningful, large-scale digital systems that will be widely used.
Contribute to a collaborative engineering culture built on craftsmanship, continuous improvement, and technical excellence.
Opportunity to work across the full engineering lifecycle—from design to build, test, deploy, and improve.
Learn from senior engineers and modern engineering practices in a mature agile environment.

About the company
Space Executive
348,189 followers
Follow
Staffing and Recruiting 11-50 employees 57 on LinkedIn
Space Executive is a multi-disciplinary, award-winning international executive search and selection recruitment agency.  With offices in Singapore, Hong Kong and London the company specialises in recruiting senior management and executive-level personnel. 

We work with Multinationals, Financial Services, Technology, Healthcare, FMCG, Consultancy, Insurance, Venture Capital & High Growth or Equity-Backed companies across Leadership and General Management, Technology and Change Management, Chief Operating Officer and Governance, Management Consultancy and Sales & Marketing positions. 

Space Executive has been recognised for its exceptional work and service delivery in recruitment; its awards include Best Places to Work in 2019, Recruitment International Best Newcomer 2016, Global Recruiter Asia Pacific Gold Award 2016, and was ranked Most Socially Engaged Staffing Agency in both 2016 and 2017 by LinkedIn.

Our clients include Sequoia Capital, Airwallex, Ant Group, Credit Suisse, Standard Chartered, Goldman Sachs, Lazada, Dyson, Diageo, PWC, William Grant, YUM Brands, WeWork, Allianz and Johnson & Johnson; they choose Space Executive because of our ability to recognise that Your Space is Our Space.

Commitments
Diversity, equity, and inclusion
At Space Executive, we are committed to equality and creating an atmosphere that values and encourages diversity of thought in our workforce, team and culture. Our goal is to create an environment where these commitments, reinforced by our values, are embedded in our day-to-day working practices with all our colleagues, clients, candidates and partners. We will provide equality of opportunity and will not tolerate discrimination of any sort.
…
Show more
Social impact
A strong commitment to Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) is one of Space Executive’s core values. We believe in giving back and creating value for the community. We envision building a community of talented individuals through youth development and empowerment and strive to operate in a sustainable, environmentally and socially responsible manner. Read more to discover how we put this commitment into action.

Show more
Work-life balance
At Space Executive, we give our employees more because we believe that looking after our employees both in and out of work creates a happier and more productive workforce and workplace environment. As everyone’s needs are different, our benefits are constantly evolving and being reviewed and revisited to ensure they best fit our employees’ needs and requirements. We embed a hybrid working model which allows for flexibility and a wide range of additional employee benefits to encourage a work-life balance such as 4pm finish on Fridays, Birthday duvet days and sabbaticals.

Environmental sustainability
At Space Executive, we strive to reduce our carbon footprint wherever possible. We promote the use of electronic communication and technology such as online customer relationship management platforms. We are committed to conserving the environment and opt to print only when necessary. We produce advice through content creation and showcase tips and thought leadership from our expert clients on this subject.
